title: Tongatapu
description: Murray Ford was scanning satellite imagery of a young island in Tonga called Hunga Tonga-Hunga Ha’apai when he noticed something odd—a turquoise plume of water—in the corner of an image.
theme:
WATER. Something special that holds
all life together
